website_summaries.verdict: Solid slow-release micellar casein powder created for muscle growth and recovery.
pros: Clean and simple formula with slow digesting micellar casein
Free of artificial additives and flavors
At 25g of protein and 120 calories per serving, it's ideal for gaining or maintaining lean muscle mass
Mild flavor works well in smoothies
cons: Scattered taste complaints and reported gritty when not mixed with enough liquid

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and was easy to mix. I’ve seen great results using this product.
customer_reviews.author: philweil99

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes delicious, mixes well especially with almond milk. My favorite thing is a smoothie with it... banana, milk, peanut butter, ice.
customer_reviews.author: louis h.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Tastes really good and I’m really picky about my protein products too!
customer_reviews.author: chuck fox

customer_reviews.title: Taste is marginal at best
customer_reviews.text: I decided to switch up from Ascent brand casein in order to save a few bucks....bad idea. In my opinion this product does not taste nearly as good and seems to have a bad aftertaste. I made pudding with it using cold milk, same way I've always done with Ascent. Oh well, live and learn! At least the shipping was fast and everything was as described!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Grainy & Gross
customer_reviews.text: This powder is terrible. It doesn't mix well at all! Its chunky & grainy. The texture made it impossible to drink. Very disappointed. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: It's the container
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes ok, mixes well and has a little fiber but the container is sooooo big. I have no where to store it. I usually keep my powder container on top of the fridge but even if it fit up there, ti's so big and heavy I'd have a hard time getting it down to use it. I have to leave it sitting out on my counter which I hate since my counter is so small already. I wish they packaged it in smaller containers cuz I seriously have to consider getting something else just because it's so unweilding.
customer_reviews.author: mommyhead

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Casein protein takes longer to digest, so I love to have this right before bedtime; I sleep better. I often have to force some food down in the middle of the night because I have a high metabolism but, this really helps me. I can have it anytime of the day but, Night is my favorite. This brand is made very clean, is GMP Certified and made in the USA. It’s made with great ingredients and they have a new fan in Me. I would definitely recommend this to all! Enjoy and Stay Healthy Everyone!😁
customer_reviews.author: Thisisit

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein! Tastes great, and is worth the price. You get a huge container! I feel great since drinking this protein!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate taste is really good
customer_reviews.text: Casein powder typically mixes thicker than whey protein, so make sure you have enough of liquid of your choice to mix it, else it will leave it very chunky. The taste of the chocolate flavor is really good, very tasty. I try and take casein after a morning workout if I know I'm going to be hours away from my next meal, keeps me a little fuller versus whey. Good ingredient list in general, little bummed by the use of suclurose. I like this product, would like to try it in shakes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie H.

customer_reviews.title: decent with water, great in oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: i think this Casein is comparable to most in terms of mixing/texture as a drink. i mix it in my oatmeal and it is like a warm milk chocolate. doesn't sit dense on the belly or create a lot of gas like others i have tried. price is on par with the average and worth the try in my books.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

product_meta.title: Bodybuilding Signature Casein Protein Powder | Chocolate Slow Release Micellar Casein | Rich in Amino Acid | 4lbs, 55 Servings
feature_bullets: SLOW RELEASE PROTEIN: Make your protein work while you sleep! Because of its slow-release, casein provides a steady stream of these amino acids to support muscle growth and recovery over several hours
SMOOTH FLAVORS: BodyBuilding.Com’s casein protein comes in both chocolate and vanilla. No matter what you’re craving, our casein protein will keep you fueled
CASEIN VS. WHEY: Whey protein digests quickly and is ideal for stimulating muscle protein synthesis after your workout. Casein, on the other hand, digests slowly and inhibits muscle protein breakdown
FUEL YOUR LIFE: With 25 grams of slow release micellar creatine protein in each serving, your favorite smoothies, puddings, and drinks are now doing the most for you

EASY ON THE GO: Mix one scoop with 6 ounces of water, milk, fruit juice, or your favorite beverage. Ideally take one serving immediately following your workout. To modify the consistency of your protein, increase or decrease the liquid level to your liking
